summary: A cabbie (Patekar) and businessman (Abraham) both in need of big money partake in a two-hour adventure together.
cast: Nana Patekar|John Abraham|Sonali Kulkarni|Sameera Reddy|Shivaaji Satam|Nassar Abdulla|Kurush Deboo|Smita Jaykar|Sanjay Dutt|Priyanka Chopra|Naushaad Abbas|Ragesh Asthana|Anuradha Chandan|Ashwin Chitale|Ajay Jadhav|Mangala Kenkre|Akash Khurana|Omkaar|Shree Rammy Pandey|Shankar Sachdev|Ganesh Yadav
title: Taxi No. 9 2 11: Nau Do Gyarah
